text: [Music]
dear friends my name is Lily and I am
going to read you a story while I read
watch out for animal friends
squirrel and puppy and read along with
me do you like those two animals they
are so cute and tiny do you have a puppy
at home no that's okay we will read with
this puppy let's begin the main
characters are squirrel and a puppy once
there were two friends a squirrel and a
puppy one day it started to rain heavily
the squirrel was in high spirits the
squirrel started doing antics but
suddenly lost his balance and fell in
the rainwater the squirrel called the
puppy for help the puppy came to his
rescue
the squirrel climbed on its back and
reached a safe place the squirrel
thanked his friend for saving his life
true friends always help each other do
you have a friend at school what do you
do with him or her have they helped you
any time bye for now
